name: TEST RANGE
description: Download the Test Range App for an awesome online test experience. Practice for any exam you want and speed up your exam preparation. We offer a storehouse of online test series and mocks to boost your performance and give you the right strategy to crack through the competitive exams.  Test Range offers exclusive practice tests for almost every major exam of the country. Here you will find exhaustive content for the following exams    Banking   SSC  Civil Services  Railways  Engineering   Medical   Computer & Information  Teaching  Law, Arts & Commerce  Designing  PSUs & Research, and a lot more What makes Test Range App special? Free Tests  Unlock a collection of free mocks for the top exams of India and start practicing. Chapter-wise Tests  We offer chapter-wise and section tests to impart a better understanding of the different topics. Quality Content  Dont start solving anything in the name of mocks. We include only relevant and quality questions in our test series Solutions Offered  Get solutions and explanations for the questions you encounter in the mocks Personalized Analysis and Feedbacks  Take honest feedbacks about your performance and identify your strong and weak points Perform, analyze, and improve your performance on Test Range app and save your study time by 40%
